fields.name: passiveTrials.included
fields.description: boolean suggesting which trials to include in analysis, chosen at experimenter discretion, e.g. by excluding the block of incorrect trials at the end of the session when the mouse has stopped

fields.name: passiveTrials.stimOn_times
fields.description: Times of stimulus onset in absolute seconds

fields.name: _iblrig_taskSettings.raw
fields.description: Metadata/Settings json (only one line). All information about the task, user, subject, contrasts, gain etc are included. (We should have a link with the structure of it somewhere)

fields.name: trials.feedbackType
fields.description: Whether feedback is positive or negative in choiceworld (-1 for negative, +1 for positive)

fields.name: trials.rewardVolume
fields.description: volume of reward given each trial in µl

fields.name: _ibl_lickPiezo.raw
fields.description: Raw lick trace (1 column array

fields.name: passiveBeeps.times
fields.description: Times of the beep, equivilent to the go cue during the choice world task

fields.name: trials.choice
fields.description: which choice was made in choiceworld: -1 (turn CCW), +1 (turn CW), or 0 (nogo)

fields.name: trials.repNum
fields.description: the repetition number of the trial, i.e. how many trials have been repeated on this side (counting from 1)

fields.name: wheel.position
fields.description: Absolute position of wheel.

fields.name: trials.response_times
fields.description: Time of "response" in choiceworld- in absolute seconds, rather than relative to trial onset. This is when one of the three possible choices is registered in software, will not be the same as when the mouse's movement to generate that response begins.

fields.name: _iblrig_encoderEvents.raw
fields.description: Data file saved from Bonsai (Event, RE timestamp, Source, data, Bonsai Timestamp) - Each row is an event sent from the state machine (1, 2, 3 - stim off, on close loop)

fields.name: trials.goCueTrigger_times
fields.description: Time of go cues in choiceworld - in absolute seconds, rather than relative to trial onset NOTE: this is the time the trigger command is sent by Bpod

fields.name: trials.intervals
fields.description: 2 column array giving each trials start (i.e. beginning of quiescent period) and stop (i.e. end of iti) times of trials in universal seconds

fields.name: sparseNoise.times
fields.description: times of those stimulus squares appeared in universal seconds

fields.name: trials.stimOff_times
fields.description: Times of stimuli in choiceworld - in absolute seconds, rather than relative to trial onset

fields.name: trials.stimOn_times
fields.description: Times of stimuli in choiceworld - in absolute seconds, rather than relative to trial onset

fields.name: passiveValveClicks.times
fields.description: Times of valve opening during passive trial presentation

fields.name: wheel.timestamps
fields.description: Timestamps for wheel timeseries

fields.name: wheelMoves.type
fields.description: string array containing classified type of movement ('CW', 'CCW', 'Flinch', 'Other')

fields.name: passiveNoise.intervals
fields.description: 2 column array giving each passive noise trial's start (i.e. beginning of quiescent period) and stop (i.e. end of iti) times of trials in universal seconds

fields.name: _iblrig_ambientSensorData.raw
fields.description: Temperature and humidity from sensor in rig

fields.name: _rigbox_jsonParameters.raw
fields.description: Parameter structure used for the task in Json format.

fields.name: _iblrig_codeFiles.raw
fields.description: Zip of Gabor2D and basicChoiceWorld code folders that generated the data

fields.name: trials.contrastLeft
fields.description: contrast of left-side stimulus (0...1) nan if trial is on other side

fields.name: passiveTrials.contrastLeft
fields.description: contrast of left-side stimulus (0...1)

fields.name: trials.contrastRight
fields.description: contrast of right-side stimulus (0...1) nan if trial is on other side

fields.name: extraRewards.times
fields.description: Times of extra rewards

fields.name: _iblrig_encoderTrialInfo.raw
fields.description: Raw trial data sent at beginning of trial from Bpod to Bonsai (TrialNum, init position of stim, stim_contrast, stim_freq, stim_angle, stim_gain, stim_sigma/size, Bonsai timestamp),

fields.name: trials.feedback_times
fields.description: Time of feedback delivery (reward or not) in choiceworld - in absolute seconds, rather than relative to trial onset

fields.name: passiveTrials.contrastRight
fields.description: contrast of right-side stimulus (0...1)

fields.name: _rigbox_block.raw
fields.description: File containing the session data, unparsed in Matlab format.

fields.name: _iblrig_taskData.raw
fields.description: Data file saved by PyBpod in json serializable lines (file itself is not a json object, each line is a json object corresponding to a trial) - Training task w/ automated contrast

fields.name: passiveWhiteNoise.times
fields.description: Times of white noise bursts, equivalent to the negative feedback sound during the choice world task

fields.name: _rigbox_hardwareInfo.raw
fields.description: Hardware configuration used for the task, json format

fields.name: trials.included
fields.description: boolean suggesting which trials to include in analysis, chosen at experimenter discretion, e.g. by excluding the block of incorrect trials at the end of the session when the mouse has stopped

fields.name: wheelMoves.intervals
fields.description: 2 column array with onset and offset times of detected wheel movements in seconds

fields.name: wheelMoves.peakAmplitude
fields.description: amplitude of the wheel move

fields.name: _iblrig_encoderPositions.raw
fields.description: Data file saved from Bonsai (Position, RE timestamp, Position, Bonsai Timestamp) - Each row is a position change of the RE

fields.name: wheel.velocity
fields.description: Signed velocity of wheel

fields.name: trials.goCue_times
fields.description: Time of go cues in choiceworld - in absolute seconds, rather than relative to trial onset

fields.name: trials.firstMovement_times
fields.description: Movement onset (absolute from session start) extracted from the rotary encoder

fields.name: _rigbox_code.raw
fields.description: Copy  of the expDef.m code file used for the session

fields.name: _ibl_trials.quiescencePeriod
fields.description: At the beginning of each trial, the mouse must not move the wheel for a fixed, “quiescent” period for the trial to continue. The quiescence period is the duration of this period in seconds.

fields.name: _ibl_trials.stimOnTrigger_times
fields.description: Times of stimulus onset trigger command

fields.name: _ibl_trials.stimOffTrigger_times
fields.description: Times of stimulus offset trigger command

fields.name: _iblrig_RFMapStim.raw
fields.description: Passive Visual stimulus raw information

fields.name: _ibl_log.info
fields.description: Log File for normal job completion

fields.name: _ibl_log.error
fields.description: Log File for errored job

fields.name: audioOnsetGoCue.times_mic
fields.description: GoCue Times extracted from microphone data (s)

fields.name: _iblmic_audioSpectrogram.frequencies
fields.description: Frequency scale of audio spectrogram from microphone (Hz)

fields.name: _iblmic_audioSpectrogram.power
fields.description: Audio spectrogram from microphone, power

fields.name: _iblmic_audioSpectrogram.times_mic
fields.description: Frequency scale of audio spectrogram from microphone (s)

fields.name: _iblrig_micData.raw
fields.description: Microphone data lossless compression for ephys

fields.name: _iblqc_ephysSaturation.samples
fields.description: A list of sample intervals exhibiting voltage saturation on the raw recordings.

fields.name: _iblqc_ephysTimeRms.timestamps
fields.description: Time scale for the RMS amplitude as a function of time, relative to the raw binary ephys file (s)

fields.name: _iblqc_ephysTimeRms.rms
fields.description: RMS amplitude as a function of time (V)

fields.name: _iblrig_stimPositionScreen.raw
fields.description: CSV file with 3 columns, CONTRAST [0->1], STIM_POSITION [visual deg], TIMESTAMP [isostandard] (saves stim positions and contrast every time they change)

fields.name: _iblqc_ephysSpectralDensity.freqs
fields.description: Frequency scale for the spectrogram (Hz)

fields.name: _iblqc_ephysSpectralDensity.power
fields.description: Spectral Density for all channels (V**2/Hz)

fields.name: _iblrig_syncSquareUpdate.raw
fields.description: Timestamped sync square update commands

fields.name: _iblrig_Camera.frame_counter
fields.description: Frame counter value from camera for each frame

fields.name: _iblrig_Camera.GPIO
fields.description: GPIO pin state for each camera frame

fields.name: _ibl_passivePeriods.intervalsTable
fields.description: Table of times for different passiveCW periode: columns = ['passiveProtocol', 'spontaneousActivity', 'RFM', 'taskReplay'], lines = ['start', 'stop']

fields.name: _ibl_passiveRFM.times
fields.description: Times of all frames presented during the receptive field mapping period

fields.name: _ibl_passiveGabor.table
fields.description: Gabor patch presentations table: columns = [start, stop, position, contrast, phase], lines = nPresentations (180)

fields.name: _ibl_passiveStims.table
fields.description: All other stimuli times: columns = [valveOn, valveOff, toneOn, toneOff, noiseOn, noiseOff], lines = nStims = 40

fields.name: _ibl_trials.laserIntervals
fields.description: Time in seconds, relative to the session start, of the onset and offset of the laser stimulation.

fields.name: _ibl_trials.laserStimulation
fields.description: Whether or not the laser was actuating during the trial (outcome): 0:no laser, 1: laser, np.nan: no info

fields.name: trials.laserProbability
fields.description: Probability of stimulation to be turned on within the trial

fields.name: camera.ROIMotionEnergy
fields.description: Motion energy across camera frames calculated within ROI (motionEnergy.position)

fields.name: ROIMotionEnergy.position
fields.description: Coordinates of the ROI in which camera.motionEnergy is calculated

fields.name: _iblrig_Camera.frameData
fields.description: Table containing Timestamp, embeddedTimeStamp, embeddedFrameCounter, embeddedGPIOPinState for each video frame

fields.name: _iblqc_ephysChannels.RMS
fields.description: Median RMS per channel from samples of raw [nch, 0] and destriped [nch, 1] ephys data.

fields.name: _iblqc_ephysChannels.rawSpikeRates
fields.description: Raw spike rate per channel without clustering or collision handling - for early stages QC purposes. [Hz]

fields.name: camera.features
fields.description: Contains features calculated from DLC traces, currently pupilDiameter_raw, pupilDiameter_smooth

fields.name: _iblqc_ephysChannels.labels
fields.description: Raw spike rate per channel without clustering or collision handling - for early stages QC purposes. [Hz]

fields.name: trials.table
fields.description: A table of trial events, one per trial. Events include: intervals, goCue_times, response_times, choice, stimOn_times, contrastLeft, contrastRight, feedback_times, feedbackType, rewardVolume, probabilityLeft, firstMovement_times

fields.name: trials.probabilityRewardLeft
fields.description: probability of a left response (i.e. CW turn) being rewarded. The probability of the right response being rewarded is 1-probabilityRewardLeft. The two probabilities are sampled independently therefore both sides may or may not be rewarded.

fields.name: fpData.raw
fields.description: Raw fiber photometry dataframe containing fluorescence data for every active channel (max: isosbestic, red and green) as well as information of coactive components with each frame (E.g TTL syncing pulse).

fields.name: fpData.channels
fields.description: Frame flag value for each LED fiber photometry channel [OFF, L415, L470, L560].  Each row corresponds to a different labelled condition.  See user manual at https://neurophotometrics.com/documentation

fields.name: _ibl_experiment.description
fields.description: A list of acquisition devices and behaviour protocols, along with the data and sync file location.  The root keys are (devices, sync, task, procedures).

fields.name: subjectTrials.table
fields.description: All trials data for a given subject, contains the same columns as _ibl_trials.table, plus additional trials data: "goCueTrigger_times", "stimOnTrigger_times", "stimFreezeTrigger_times", "stimFreeze_times", "stimOffTrigger_times", "stimOff_times", "phase", "position", "quiescence". The following are session meta data columns: "session", "session_start_time" and "task_protocol", "protocol_number"

fields.name: subjectTraining.table
fields.description: Overview of training status for subject, date and session at which the subject reached different training criterion

fields.name: videoTracking.trainingDataPaw
fields.description: Manual labels of the paws for training pose estimation algorithms. Contains csv files with labels, frame images and short video snippets from various sessions

fields.name: videoTracking.trainingDataPupil
fields.description: Manual labels of the pupils for training pose estimation algorithms. Contains csv files with labels, frame images and short video snippets from various sessions

fields.name: camera.lightningPose
fields.description: Dataframe with coordinates of body parts as estimated by Lightning Pose algorithm

fields.name: _timeline_softwareEvents.log
fields.description: A table of software events in DAQ time, one row per event. Columns include 'time', 'name', and 'info'.

fields.name: _ibl_clusters.table
fields.description: Aggregate of several sessions clusters in a recapitulative table

fields.name: _ibl_projectClusters.table
fields.description: Aggregate of several sessions clusters in a recapitulative table

fields.name: _ibl_projectChannels.table
fields.description: Aggregate of several sessions channels in a recapitulative table

fields.name: _ibl_projectEphysFeatures.table
fields.description: Aggregate of channel based electrophysiology features in a recapitualive table

fields.name: _ibl_rawImagingData.meta
fields.description: Image meta-data listing the depths and dimensions of each field of view, acquisition parameters, channels, and the MLAP coordinates of the imaging window center.

fields.name: laserStimulation.intervals
fields.description: The start and end times of the laser stimulation period.

fields.name: passingSpikes.table
fields.description: A compressed table containing only the spikes belonging to passing units, to accelerate data loading.

fields.name: fpData.digitalInputs
fields.description: Parquet or CSV file output by Bonsai containing the synchronisation TTLs.

fields.name: _sp_video.times
fields.description: An array of passive video frame times, where each column represents a repeat of the video.

fields.name: _sp_video.raw
fields.description: The video frames presented during the protocol.

fields.name: subjectSessions.table
fields.description: All session data included in the subjectTrials table for a given subject, contains the columns lab, session date, session number, task protocol and project

fields.name: _ibl_optoStimulation.intervals
fields.description: Time in seconds, relative to the session start, of the onset and offset of the opto stimulation.
